task.title: Editing a Link Definition
task.shortdesc: You can edit a link definition after it has been created.

step.cmd: Open the workspace where the link originates (source workspace).
Right-click the link origination point, which can be one of the following:

choices.choice: The highlighted Navigator item for this workspace.
An icon in the graphic view.
A row in the table view.
A row in the situation event console view.
A bar in the bar chart view.
A slice in the pie chart view.
A point in the plot chart view.

step.cmd: In the Workspace Link Wizard - Welcome page, select Modify an existing link and click Next>.

In the Workspace Link Wizard - Link to Modify page, select the name of the link to edit, then click Next>. Before clicking Next, you can clear the
Hide links that are not available for the select view check box to see all the links for this workspace.
Edit the name or description, then click Next> to open the Link editor.
Click Next until you reach the summary page, then click Finish.
